Use the following generation settings:

Tone: Write in a neutral, information-focused tone.Mild emphasis is allowed to clarify relevance, but avoid emotional language, exaggeration, or persuasive phrasing.The tone should remain calm and descriptive.

generated_body: If you click on the article titled "Welcome to the World! All of the Celebrity Babies Who've Made Their Debuts in 2019," you may expect a detailed overview of notable celebrity births that occurred during that year. Overall, the article could serve as a reflection of contemporary celebrity culture and family dynamics.
